name: The Pale Dot
description:
A cosmic drifter lands upon the sole moon of the planet Jiten, greeted by sentient tools of the elements, seeking her help. Hijinks may or may not ensue. A student project created at The University of Central Florida. Features 3 unique levels, taking about 10-15 minutes to complete. 

Produced by Jonah Dearth

Designed by Jonah Dearth and Tim Sandburg

Character and Promotional Art by William MacFarlane

Environmental Art by Frances Maldonado

Composed by Nora Barnes

Programming by Alberto Martinez and Lylly Hoang
